sentences.en: ‘You’re under arrest.’ ‘On what grounds?’
sentences.cn: “你被捕了。”“理由是什么？”

sentences.en: a football/recreation/sports, etc. ground
sentences.cn: 足球场、娱乐场地、运动场等

sentences.en: All planes are grounded until the fog clears.
sentences.cn: 雾散之前，所有的飞机都停飞了。

sentences.en: Dig over any ground that is clear of crops and plants.
sentences.cn: 把没种庄稼和植物的土地都深翻一遍。

sentences.en: he doesn't appreciate the steps he must take to get the negotiations off the ground.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢自己为使谈判得以开始而不得不采取的那些步骤。

sentences.en: He lay on the ground and stared up at the sky.
sentences.cn: 他躺在地上仰望天空。

sentences.en: he refused to give ground on this issue.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝在这一问题上让步。

sentences.en: His message was aimed at the undecided middle ground of Israeli politics.
sentences.cn: 他所传达的信息针对的是以色列政局中尚未表态的中间派。

sentences.en: I found her lying on the ground.
sentences.cn: 我发现她躺在地上。

sentences.en: Kevin was always level-headed with both feet on the ground.
sentences.cn: 凯文总是头脑冷静，脚踏实地。

sentences.en: new moral attitudes are gaining ground.
sentences.cn: 新的道德观越来越为人们所接受。

sentences.en: new textbooks on particle physics are thin on the ground.
sentences.cn: 粒子物理学的新教材为数不多。

sentences.en: On either side of the tracks the ground fell away sharply.
sentences.cn: 跑道两侧都是很陡的斜坡。

sentences.en: On her own ground she knows exactly what she's doing.
sentences.cn: 她在自己熟悉的领域里对自己的行为有十足的把握。

sentences.en: Sam stood his ground and got a blow that stunned him.
sentences.cn: 萨姆站在原地，被一下打昏了。

sentences.en: Sensing she was on shaky ground, Marie changed the subject.
sentences.cn: 感到自己的观点站不住脚，玛丽于是换了个话题。

sentences.en: She showed him around the ground floor of the empty house.
sentences.cn: 她带他参观了这处空房子的底楼。

sentences.en: The armed forces have launched offensives to recapture lost ground.
sentences.cn: 这支武装部队已发动进攻要夺回失去的阵地。

sentences.en: The beans are then ground and packaged for sale as ground coffee.
sentences.cn: 然后那些咖啡豆被磨碎，包装好作为咖啡粉出售。

sentences.en: the dollar gained ground on all other major currencies.
sentences.cn: 美元已赶上所有其他主要货币。

sentences.en: The elevator creaked to a halt at the ground floor.
sentences.cn: 电梯嘎吱一声停在了一层。

sentences.en: The knife stuck in the ground at his feet.
sentences.cn: 刀扎在了他脚边的地上。

sentences.en: The president said he had no intention of deploying ground troops.
sentences.cn: 总统称并不打算部署地面部队。

sentences.en: The region, with its widespread poverty, provided fertile ground for revolutionary activists.
sentences.cn: 这个地区普遍贫困，是产生革命活动家的沃土。

sentences.en: the troops on the ground are cynical.
sentences.cn: 战地的部队只顾自身的安危。

sentences.en: There are strong grounds for believing his statement.
sentences.cn: 有充分的理由可以相信他的话。

sentences.en: There are strong signs that his views are gaining ground.
sentences.cn: 各种明显的迹象显示他的观点越来越受欢迎。

sentences.en: They found a labyrinth of tunnels under the ground.
sentences.cn: 他们发现了一处迷宫似的地道。

sentences.en: you will be able to hold your ground and resist the enemy's attack.
sentences.cn: 你将能够坚守阵地并抵御敌人的进攻。

words.tran_cn: 磨的；刺耳的；令人难以忍受的
[机] 研磨机；研磨者；磨工；臼齿
[电] 接地；基础；搁浅；（染色的）底色
土地的；地面上的；磨碎的；磨过的
使接触地面；打基础；使搁浅

phrases.phrase: be thick (或 thin) on the ground
break ground N. Amer. 北美

phrases.tran_cn: （争论双方的）共同基础；一致之处

phrases.phrase: cut the ground from under someone's feet
phrases.tran_cn: 使（某人的）行为无正当理由，使（某人的）观点无据可依
彻底地，完全；在一切方面
越来越得人心，越来越为人们所接受
逼近（追赶对象，竞争对手），追上

phrases.phrase: get in on the ground floor
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)在企业的草创阶段加入

phrases.phrase: get off the ground (或 get something off the ground

phrases.tran_cn: 打滚地球出局：因打出的滚地球被截或被掷回一垒而出局
给某人在某方面打下良好基础
不让步；不退却；保持优势
在地下（掩埋着的）；在土里
软弱地基；软土地面；不稳定地层；弱土质

trans.tran_en: ground coffee or nuts have been broken up into powder or very small pieces, using a special machine

trans.tran_cn: 地面，土地，基础，范围，阵地，战场
trans.tran_en: a good reason for doing, believing, or saying something

trans.tran_cn: 禁足，grind的过去式和过去分词
trans.tran_en: if you ground a boat or if it grounds, it hits the bottom of the sea so that it cannot move

trans.tran_cn: 把…放在地上，在…的基础树立上，交给…基本知识，使…受初步训练
